name: Escape Pyre House
description:
**Hoping this will work, My computer died 16 hours before the deadline and had to finish the rest on a very old mac mini so haven't been able  to play test certain parts uploaded to wetransfer for download as couldnt' upload as webGL and zip file always gave an error**

**For the best experience play with headphones**

Escape Pyre House You are trapped inside Pyre House which has been long abandoned. Look for clues, solve riddles and puzzles to find the keys to unlock the rooms of the house in order to find the key to the front door. There is no power in the house all you have is your flashlight which will drain as you use it, when it is empty you need to charge it in order for it to work again. The house has a strange presence in it which is not happy that you are there. Controls: AWSD / Arrow Keys = Movement Mouse = Camera Control Right Click = Turn the flashlight on and off Left click = Interact Scroll Wheel Up = Charge the flashlight when it is empty Esc = Hide/Unhide the mouse cursor **For the best experience play with headphones on** All made by me besides: Furniture is from Kenney.nl
Bear Painting by Lzubiaur (opengameart.org)
